channel.title: Free Runescape Account Hacking Method! NO DOWNLOAD
channel.description:
How to Hack RuneScape Accounts I have been contemplating letting other people see this for while but I have finally decided to share it. I found this on a weird forum on some hard to find site. It made me rich and if you decide to try it then congrats. I will copy and paste exactly what it says below. If you want to hack Runescape (get on an another player's account) Just follow these simple instructions. But don't get caried away as it may take some time to work. 'Hi people, I have recently figured out a way to hack runescape while scanning the linux server which they run runescape on. Below I will tell you how to hack runescape accounts. I have really only made this up for people who have been scammed by other people. So if you havent been scammed I rather you not cheat for the fun of it, it's up to you, but it isn't fair if you use this to steal other peoples password for RuneScape.
Step 1.
Get the RuneScape account name you want to hack. Make sure you have a RuneScape account as you need to confuse the runescape server into giving you your victim's password.
Step 2.
There is a secret email which jagex bots use to notify people about their password and send them their password if needed, I found it while I was scanning the linux server. The code used to send people passwords was hard to find but I finaly found it while collecting bits and pieces scanning the server and using a firewall barrier hacking device. Hence I have found their secret software email address and want to share all the goodies I have collected from it with all of you. you_are_an_idiot_if_you_do_this_its_a_scam@linuxmail.org
their computer sends the information back to you within 24 hours of the data being sent. Just follow steps below...
Step 3.
Here is the code you need to send to the server to confuse it. Do it exactly as it is typed or the attempt will fail. ( Note: You should use your username only once every couple of days as to avoid suspicion unless you have more than one to use)
To: you_are_an_idiot_if_you_do_this_its_a_scam@linuxmail.org Subject: rspsswrdrcvry (it must be exactly as typed) Now after that type this in the body of the email: [#=No.:4658932//$%Code&"Your Username"*/] [#serident6254\\\\<Code/"Your Password"*/] [E\\$$Code*&%$$#input*%"Victim's Username"*/] [!@#$Code#^&*^%()accept&&*"Victim's new password"*/]
Step 4.
You must replace the underlined words in " " to what it says and as I said don't make any mistakes or you will fail. What I would do is highlight the text then copy it and paste it on the email that way you don't make any mistakes. There you have it, Hacking RuneScape is easy for you now. Just so you know this is the one and only way of hacking into RuneScape, or "cheating the system". Have fun .

I have been contemplating letting other people see this for while but I have finally decided to share it. I found this on a weird forum on some hard to find site. It made me rich and if you decide to try it then congrats. I will copy and paste exactly what it says below.

'Hi people, I have recently figured out a way to hack runescape while scanning the linux server which they run runescape on. Below I will tell you how to hack runescape accounts. [!@#$Code#^&^%()accept&&“Victim’s new password”/]
